source.9a89f117: The map() function executes a specified function for each item in an iterable. The item is sent to the function as a parameter.
source.75082d6f: The reduce(fun,seq) function is used to apply a particular function passed in its argument to all of the list elements mentioned in the sequence passed along.This function is defined in “functools” module.
